reference_summary:
Pine Gel Nail Polish Set Chameleon Shimmering Color and Black 7.5 ml LED UV Cured Soak Off Nail Gel for Nail Art Manicure
pine
{'Brand': 'Pine', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Liquid Volume': '0.25 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '4.96 x 3.7 x 2.91 inches; 9.14 Ounces', 'UPC': '738628890993'}
These are fun colors. I love that each bottle has the color at the top of the cap. So often it's hard to find the color you're looking for. I got a couple of sets from this company, and they're all quality.
Love the colors, and that each bottle has the color on the top of the cap.
Gel Nail Polish Set, Glitter 6 Colors Gel Polish Kit Popular Nail Art Design Soak Off LED Lamp Nail Polish Gel Manicure Kit Gifts Set for Girls Women Professional DIY Home Use
Anzuo
{'Brand': 'Anzuo', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Number of Pieces': '6', 'Product Dimensions': '5.12 x 3.15 x 3.54 inches; 10.23 Ounces'}
These are fun colors; I'd say more New Years Eve party than Xmas. I like that it comes with stickers to mark the top of the caps, but I wish each bottle had the color at the top of the cap already, since it can take some time for the polish to dry. I guess you could write it down? So often it's hard to find the color you're looking for. I got a couple of sets from this company, and they're all quality.
Love the colors, more New Years Eve party than Xmas. Would have preferred color already on cap.
Organic Sweet Almond Oil and Fractionated Coconut Oil Bundle for Hair and Skin, 100% Pure and Natural, Hexane-Free, Moisturizing, For Healthy Skin, Silky Hair, Multiuse Body Oil, 16 fl. Oz X 2
Shiny Leaf
{'Brand': 'Shiny Leaf', 'Scent': 'Almond Oil and Fractionated Coconut', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Unit Count': '32.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '8.62 x 5.04 x 2.48 inches; 2.23 Pounds', 'UPC': '781584950669'}
As another reviewer said, in much better detail so I'll keep my review brief, the coconut oil being refined does nothing for skincare. I assume the other is in the same boat, despite being unrefined. Which is a shame, since that is what I got them for. Oh well, partly my fault I guess for not reading the fine print.
Wish I'd seen "refined" before selecting.
8 PCS 40ML Mini Spray Bottles, FANDAMEI Fine Mist Plastic Spray Bottles, Empty Refillable Clear Atomizer for Cleaning, Travel, Essential Oils, Perfume, Makeup Liquids. Travel Size, Pink & Blue
Fandamei
{'Brand': 'Fandamei', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Capacity': '40 Milliliters', 'Number of Items': '8', 'Special Feature': 'Mist Spray', 'Package Dimensions': '8.46 x 5.79 x 1.42 inches; 5.93 Ounces'}
Excellent travel size, sturdy enough to withstand travel. Good price. The two colors make it a little easier for organization.
Sturdy, compact spray bottles.
Heyedrate Activated Charcoal Soap Bar and Face Wash | Organic, Vegan, Natural Soap made with Dead Sea Mud and Our Essential Oil Blend (1 Pack (5 Ounces))
Eye Love
{'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Brand': 'Eye Love', 'Scent': 'Eucalyptus, Coconut, Grapefruit, Rosemary', 'Material Feature': 'Organic, Natural, Vegan', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '4 x 1 x 1 inches; 4.97 Ounces', 'UPC': '850436007827'}
I like the ingredients, not super in love with the scent, but it's faint and doesn't linger, so no problem really. This worked up a good lather, not the best, but better than others with a washcloth; the lather didn't disappear either so I didn't need to keep going back to the soap. It's a nice size, larger than others I've tried, and seems like it will last at least a week, probably longer. Non-daily use it could last much longer. As far as moisturizing, I can at least say it didn't dry me out, which is a plus.
Faint scent doesn't linger, good lather.

**User Preference Summary:**

- **Product Preference**: The user maintains a strong inclination towards gel nail polish sets with vibrant colors for special occasions, while continuing to explore hair and skin products. Their latest purchase of a scrunchie holder stand reflects a growing interest in organized beauty accessories that are both practical and aesthetically pleasing.

- **Aesthetic Values**: Emphasizes practicality and effective design in beauty items, appreciating thoughtful details like sustainable packaging and organization tools. The recent enjoyment of accessible storage solutions indicates a trend toward functional aesthetic enhancements in their beauty routine.

- **Quality Awareness**: Continues to prioritize high-quality, effective products. Their satisfaction with both long-lasting beauty items and nicely packaged accessories suggests a preference for well-rated items that combine practical use with aesthetic appeal.

- **Conscious Choices**: Stays committed to non-toxic, cruelty-free, and organic options, integrating ethical considerations effortlessly into their beauty and skincare selections. This dedication to brands that uphold these values remains a cornerstone of their shopping behavior.

- **Engagement Style**: Demonstrates loyalty to trusted brands while developing an eye for product specifications and reviews. This approach reflects a well-rounded purchasing strategy, balancing quality, usability, and ethical considerations.

Overall, the user reinforces their focus on practical, aesthetically attractive, and ethically responsible products, with an expanding interest in natural ingredients and organized beauty solutions.
